show_name: The Glass Mask Year 3 Class D (TV)
plot: To "warm up" cold hearts of modern people, Maya, Ayumi, Chigusa, and Yū have teleported from the universe of Glass Mask to a modern high school, trying to ignite the passion of drama among high schooler nowadays. School director Masumi, however, thinks otherwise.
ending_theme: "Tasogare no End" (黄昏のエンド) by Kana Asumi & Rumi Ōkubo feat. Yūki Kaji
